resources.string: Do you want to buy a 20 minute timewaster for 1 Aura? This purchase will lift off all restrictions from this app or item for the next 20 minutes.
You have 0 Aura, perform a quest to earn Aura now!
Are you sure you want to continue wasting your time?
Accessibilty Services required to run blockers.
This app requires overlay permission to display warning screen each time when a blocked item is found on screen.
Notification permission required to receive quest updates.
Precise Location permission required to track location for this quest.
Camera permission required to track position and count reps for this quest.

DigiPaws is an open-source Android productivity utility designed to help users reduce screen addiction by regulating app usage through a gamified experience. The application offers three distinct modes—Easy, Adventure, and Hard—each with unique features and challenges to promote healthy screen time habits.

In Easy Mode, DigiPaws provides gentle reminders to help you manage your screen time. When you attempt to access a blocked app, a warning screen appears. If you choose to proceed, a cooldown period starts. After the cooldown, another warning is displayed to remind you of your usage.

Adventure Mode introduces a gamified experience to control screen time. To access a blocked app, you need Aura. These can be earned by completing quests such as a quick 1 km walk. Each Aura grants 20 minutes of usage time for any blocked app, encouraging physical activity and mindful screen use.

Hard Mode offers the most stringent control over app usage. In this mode, when you try to open a blocked app, the back button is automatically pressed without any warning or cooldown, preventing access entirely.
What do you wish to block?
#TechRehab is a 3 week productivity challenge that blocks all uninstall attempts on this app.
This is the cooldown period between each warnings.(ONLY FOR EASY MODE)
Select the apps you wish to block or receive usage warnings for.
Allow this app to act as an quest and modify Aura count?
Move out of the above red zone to win this quest. There is no penalty for failing this quest. Do not forget to carry your phone!
Simply perform $valuex squats to earn 1 Aura point. You are free to perform this quest in sets of any.Make sure your entire body is visible on camera above. Not working?
Simply perform $valuex pushups to earn 1 Aura point. You are free to perform this quest in sets of any. Make sure your entire body is visible on camera above. Not working?

Focus or survival mode blocks all apps except basic needs like calling and SMS for the next 90 minutes. Once focus mode is turned on, it CANNOT be turned off until the timer goes off. Completing this quest brings 1 Aura coin.
By continuing, you agree to our Terms and Conditions

This app solely depends on Accessibility Permission to block elements. We do not store any of this data on our servers; everything is processed locally. By pressing "Agree," you accept our data usage policy.
To ensure this app works properly, please disable battery optimization for this app.
